headline: Assessing First Solar After 43% 2025 Rally and Clean Energy Policy Momentum
summary: Curious whether First Solar is a smart opportunity or overpriced at current levels? You are not alone—many investors are trying to figure out if now is the right time to dive in. The stock has surged 10.6% over the past week and notched an impressive 43.2% gain year-to-date, suggesting there is some real momentum driving recent enthusiasm. Much of this interest has been fueled by fresh headlines highlighting U.S. policy support for clean energy manufacturing and global demand for solar...

headline: First Solar (FSLR) Profit Growth Forecasts Bolster Bullish Narratives Despite Margin Moderation
summary: First Solar (FSLR) delivered a strong set of headline numbers, with earnings projected to grow 23.68% per year and annual revenue forecast to expand by 11.2%, both outpacing the broader U.S. market. Over the past five years, earnings have climbed an average of 36.9% per year, even as net profit margins moderated from 32.4% to a still-robust 27.7%. The combination of sustained earnings momentum and expanding revenue keeps the company's outlook firmly on the front foot for investors. See our...
